subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Torrey Pines in San Diego will be listed at 7,643 yards, making it the longest course in major championship history. But it has the potential for the shortest par 3 at a U.S. Open in eight years.
snippet: Torrey Pines in San Diego will be listed at 7,643 yards, making it the longest course in major championship history. But it has the potential for the shortest par 3 at a U.S. Open in eight years.
